title: StopScam: Scam Detector Pro
description: StopScam is an AI-powered scam detection app that scans physical documents, PDFs, text, and images in real time. Take photos directly in the app or upload multiple files at once. You can capture mail envelopes on the spot and even scan screenshots on the go. Get actionable insights, scam probability scores, and color-coded results. With unlimited scans via subscription, StopScam estimates potential financial losses and keeps you safe worldwide. Includes Spanish localization for a broader reach.
